tool_description: An API that returns info for the latest Star Wars Lego sets!
name: Lego Star Wars Sets
title: Lego Star Wars Sets

api_list.name: Get Individual Lego Star Wars set
api_list.description: This endpoint returns data for a specific Lego Star Wars set.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lego-star-wars-sets.p.rapidapi.com/api/products/752927529275292"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lego-star-wars-sets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lego-star-wars-sets.p.rapidapi.com/api/products/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lego-star-wars-sets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Lego Star Wars Sets
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Star Wars branded Lego sets.
